## Description and Rationale

A group of Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University students and researchers interested in flight data research and aviation safety. Participation in the challenge will enable exploration of machine learning methods to ADS-B data, support sustainability initiatives in aviation, and help students develop competencies necessary for success in their data analytics professions. Joao S D Garcia, Daniel Pleffken, Avinash Muthu Krishnan, and Lucas Ferrando Quilez, faculty at ERAU, will mentor the team.
